name: web-component-base
description: A zero-dependency, ~760 Bytes (minified & brotlied), JS base class for creating reactive custom elements easily

scripts.build: npm run generate:types && npm run copy:meta && npm run copy:source && npm run minify
scripts.copy:meta: cp package.json ./dist && cp README.md ./dist && cp LICENSE ./dist
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && cd ./dist && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run publish

author: Ayo Ayco
